I am an Engineer, currently pursuing B.S. in Mechanical Engineering at New York University Abu Dhabi. I am interested in product design and manufacturing. Before coming to NYU Abu Dhabi, I studied at Nishiyamato Gakuen High School in Nara, Japan.
